name: Clockwork Game
description:
A game for a McGill game jam for the theme clockwork. This prototype is largely inspired by INSIDE, and though there is not a whole ton to do right now, it has one puzzle more or less working as a proof of concept. Get the source code here: https://github.com/scsewell/ClockworkGame

Controls:

Move - Left Stick / Arrow Keys

Jump - A / Space

Grab/Interact - X / Right Control (Held down)
